section.title: customer groups creating new Customer Group
section.para: To create a new customer Group, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: Create your customer Groups using a logical, hierarchical structure. This will make it easier to retrieve customer Group information in the future.

section.para: When creating a new customer Group, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a name to identify the customer Group.
Enter a description to identify the customer Group.
Display lists customers who are members of the customer Group.
